name: MariaDB
description: Drop-in MySQL replacement with enhanced performance and additional features.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  mariadb:
    image: mariadb:latest
    container_name: mariadb
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD={{MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD}}
      - MYSQL_DATABASE={{MYSQL_DATABASE}}
      - MYSQL_USER={{MYSQL_USER}}
      - MYSQL_PASSWORD={{MYSQL_PASSWORD}}
    ports:
      - "{{PORT}}:3306"
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}:/var/lib/mysql
    command: --character-set-server=utf8mb4 --collation-server=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=mariadb"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=database"

notes: MySQL compatible, can be used as a drop-in replacement
Change default passwords before production use
phpMyAdmin can be used for web-based management
